attributes.action: Offer White South Africans asylum in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
I could put many sources here for you to see but I've chosen this one by Katie Hopkins. She went out to SA and spoke to the people who are being attacked. You cannot stand idly by while they are being slaughtered. This is URGENT. Every day you waste will mean another family is attacked. 

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3_8DjnuRs8I&index=5&list=PL2HWRRSziC_ERBmbgAZj1FMYYWH5f_iUr&t=0s
attributes.background: South African farmers are being beaten, raped and murdered in their own homes purely because they are white. We never see it on the news or in the papers. Their plight is totally ignored by our government. We need you to act NOW!

rejection.details:
People can already claim asylum if they have left their country and are unable to go back because they fear persecution.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/claim-asylum
